entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Oh. Okay. That’s interesting.  You know what I really can’t believe?  That you are posting this bullshit instead of trying to unite a divided country, dealing with Russia putting bounties on US soldiers or talking about the #CoronavirusPandemic.  Get your priorities right!
